title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Stories of Light and Dark
description: 'This is an Alternate Cover to Book ISBN: 9781368057295'From Anakin to Yoda, Count Dooku to Darth Maul, this exciting middle grade anthology will recount different explosive events from The Clone Wars from the points of view everyone's favorite characters--with each character written by a different popular author.A great overview for kids new to the series and a treat for fans!Contributors: Lou Anders, Tom Angleberger, Preeti Chhibber, Zoraida CÃ³rdova, Sarah Beth Durst, Jason Fry, Yoon Ha Lee, Rebecca Roanhorse, Anne Ursu, Greg van Eekhout
author: Lou Anders
